overview: The Eyes Are The Window To The Neighborhood. --- Four suburban couples, live on an anonymous culdesac in a nondescript suburb in Anytown, USA. The odd coincidence is that every one of their houses has a perfect view into every other one. Paul Thomas presents a major new film dealing with the American passion for voyeurism. Sneak a peek. Everyone else does...
tagline: Sneak a peek. Everyone else does...
title: Looking In
